Text: So what DLC is in this release? all of them? I hope so because i've been looking for a BL2 torrent with every DLC and latest patch.
yes all of them, i think there will be another repack. one more dlc releasing end of this month > Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep

it says it contains (DLC wise); Collector's Edition Pack - Creature Slaughterdome - Premiere Club - Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack - Assassin Pack - Commando Pack - Gunzerker Pack - Mechromancer Pack - Siren Pack - Psycho Pack - Captain Scarlett and her Pirate's Booty - Mr.Torgue 's Campaign of Carnage - Sir Hammerlock's Big Game Hunt

those are all the complete dlc's. we just list them to let everyone know what is included. but if we missed out any, we will repack the whole thing complete after the release of final dlc end of this month. cheers :)
Just curious, does this contain the supremacy packs?
or the domination or madness packs for that matter?
Does this contain the madness, supremacy and domination head/skin packs with this?
Me and a friend downloaded this, and got on hamachi. When we tried to connect to each other, a message comes up saying "you are playing a different patch version", when we have the same download.
I downloaded it and installed it but, the DLC isn't loading or working. I see that all the DLC is in the DLC folder but in-game I don't have any.

Never mind my last comment, I figured it out.

Also, why can't I connect to the shift thing? I was to put in shift codes but I'm unable to connect ever.
